text.name: n7
text.text: to start game: Click the button Add villagers Game Mechanics: Hunger, Energy, and HP When a pawn's Hunger or Energy reaches critically low levels, HP will decrease gradually. Conversely, HP will recover when Hunger is high. While sleeping, the rate of Hunger depletion is reduced to one-third of the normal speed. Manage these stats wisely to keep your pawn healthy and strong.
